name: Garbage Office 2001
description:
Garbage Office 2001

a game fill with garbage.

Score points by throwing the garbage into the trash can.

The trash can will move spots after you get five points.

You become the master of trash when you reach 25 points.

Controls

Mouse: Aim

Left Click: Shoot Garbage

R: Restart Game

Team

Game Programmer: Ricky Lyu

Game Artists: Barry Ma, Gary Feng

Game Concept: Ricky Lyu
